definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[טָלוּא]] Ge 30:32, Ge 30:32, Ge 30:33; pl. [[טְלֻאִים]] v:Ge 30:35, v:Ge 30:39; [[טְלֻאוֹת]] Ez Eze 16:16; [[טְלֻאׂת]]) Ge 30:35; chiefly of spotted, variegated sheep and goats (Jacob & Laban); ‖[[נׇקׂד]], [[נְקֻדִּים]] Ge 30:32, Ge 30:32, Ge 30:33, Ge 30:35; ‖[[עקדים]] Ge 30:35; ‖ both, v:Ge 30:39 (all J); of high places, variegated (gaily-coloured shrines) Ez Eze 16:16.
